price: 30. Tetapi ketika kebenaran (Al-Qur`ān) itu datang kepada mereka, mereka berkata, “Ini adalah sihir, dan sesungguhnya kami mengingkarinya.”
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu qālū hādhā siḥ'run wa-innā bihi kāfirūna
